tactic: induction H as [|T H IH|X Y f H1 H2 IH].
exceptions.exn: Abstracting over the term "X" leads to a term fun X0 : Type => FiniteT_nat_cardinal (option X0) (add_finite X0 H) = S (FiniteT_nat_cardinal X0 H) which is ill-typed. Reason is: Illegal application: The term "add_finite" of type "forall T : Type, FiniteT T -> FiniteT (option T)" cannot be applied to the terms "X0" : "Type" "H" : "FiniteT X" The 2nd term has type "FiniteT X" which should be coercible to "FiniteT X0".

original: intros X H. induction H as [|T H IH|X Y f H1 H2 IH]. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite IH. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite IH. reflexivity.
